about_the_game:
Character Costume DLC Released!



New Costume. Chiffon : Christmas
This is Chiffon Fairchild's costume that looks more beautiful with Christmas.

" This DLC contains [Chiffon Fairchild : Christmas].
: Can be applied to all in-game Chiffon Fairchild scenarios.

- The basic heroine graphics appearing in the story mode are changed to match the costume.
- In card battles and character battles, the heroine graphics are changed to match the costume.
- You can change the challenge mode player character to a heroine costume.
(* Costume change does not apply to event graphics in the love scene.)"

The Game Flow
- Requires Battle Heroine Crisis to play this DLC.
- Includes an additional costume for Chiffon Fairchild.
- If you select a costume on the character selection screen, you can play the game with a new heroine outfit.

Change your heroine's outfit and try a new experience!
